title: Iceberg logo semi-slabserif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091030164609im_/http:/typophile.com/files/iceberg_4593.jpg)

Please ID font.

Thanks for all help.

Mara
author: mkstudio

comments.content:
I’m thinking this is custom. It might be a neutered Rockwell.

- Lex
Looks like an ITC Lubalin Graph–Rockwell mongrel.

Lex, Conor,Balance.  
Thanks very much. I immediately thought Lubalin as well except I knew it wasn’t Thanks for your messages.  
Mara

I’m with Lex’s first guess — Rockwell. The R is perfect, and so is the G. Clip serifs off the right places and clip a bit from the lower jaw of the C, and I think you’d have it. That’s what I’d do to re-create it.

- Mike Yanega
